about.content: I'm a chemical engineer turned developer and I absolutely LOVE making difficult tasks as simple as possible.
about.alt: A photo of me recieving congratulations from UMass Amherst's Electrical/Computer Engineering department head, Professor Hollot.

jobs.title: Rochester Electronics
description: Manufactured conductors per client design by performing experiements to assess optimal bath conditions, responded accordingly to any issue that arose and continued to improve the efficiency of the overall plating process.
Collected conductor deposition data using XRF (X-ray fluorescence) analysis and chemical bath concentrations were monitored via titrations and flame-AA.
Worked closely with other process engineers and helped identify and resolve technical issues.

jobs.title: CVS Pharmacy
description: Filled prescriptions, managed patient PHI and administered Covid-19 PCR tests while conveying any issues to a supervising nurse practitioner.
Worked directly with patients and provided any information on prescription medications, insurance policies, Covid-19 or vacinations.
Used accessible information to learn more about pharmacy and prepared to attend MCPHS for further education in a pharmaceutical discipline.

certifications.title: Responsive Web Design
certifications.description: The basics of HTML & CSS including modern CSS and responsive design.

certifications.title: Algorithms & Data Structures w/ Javascript
certifications.description: The fundamentals of JavaScript including dataTypes, OOP, and Functional Programming.

certifications.title: Data Visualization w/ Javascript
certifications.description: The basics of D3.js including building intractive charts, graphs, and maps along with basic JSON manipulation and working with online data using APIs.

certifications.title: Scientific Computing w/ Python
certifications.description: Python fundamentals like variables, loops, conditionals, and functions along with complex data structures, networking, relational databases, and data visualization.

certifications.title: Data Analysis w/ Python
certifications.description: The fundamentals of data analysis with Python including reading data from sources like CSVs and SQL, and using libraries like Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn to process and visualize data.

certifications.title: Machine Learning w/ Python
certifications.description: Learned to use the TensorFlow framework to build several types of neural networks and create more advanced ML programs involving techniques like natural language processing and reinforcement learning.

certifications.title: Front End Development Libraries w/ Javascript
certifications.description: Utilized Bootstrap, CSS logic and Sass functions to build useful tools and created powerful Single Page Applications (SPAs) using React and Redux.
